about_the_game:
Mythos, a mysterious traveler that lost his memories,

the only clue he has about himself is a "Feather" that seems to be contains a mysterious power.

Led by the legend of the feather told in some region, Mythos start to travel wherever he could find a clue about himself.

In the middle of his journey he come to Gensokyo, a land of mysticism of the east.
Here, he meet people that will guide him on his journey.

- 5 Heroines that will give you trials

- 20 sex scene and more with some harems

- 30 miniquests to clear

- and don't forget the cute girls

- pregnancy ending

The player must clear the mystery of people heart frozen over which is mentioned in this winter village myths to continue his journey.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains explicit sexual content of procreating with fantasy girls.
All characters depicted are older than 21 years old.

detailed_description:
Mythos, a mysterious traveler that lost his memories,

the only clue he has about himself is a "Feather" that seems to be contains a mysterious power.

Led by the legend of the feather told in some region, Mythos start to travel wherever he could find a clue about himself.

In the middle of his journey he come to Gensokyo, a land of mysticism of the east.
Here, he meet people that will guide him on his journey.

- 5 Heroines that will give you trials

- 20 sex scene and more with some harems

- 30 miniquests to clear

- and don't forget the cute girls

- pregnancy ending

The player must clear the mystery of people heart frozen over which is mentioned in this winter village myths to continue his journey.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: X 10.13
  • Processor: iMac "Core i3" equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 5670
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: still need further confirmation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X Lion
  • Processor: iMac "Core i5" equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 5670
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: still need further confirmation

name: Legend of Mythos ~Touhou Winter Heart Cage~

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD Athlon 64 X2 6400+ 3.20 GHz or Intel Core2 Duo E6850 3.00GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Phenom II X4 955 3.20 GHz or Intel Core i5-760 2.80 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6450 / Intel HD 4000 / Nvidia GT 710
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c Compatible

short_description: Mythos, a man of mystery arrives in the mystical winter town. He meets a lot of sexy girls that seem to be inhuman even at the first glance. With the dreams of befriending all the girls in the world. Now, he set forth towards his romance saga.
